Scale UI

Source: R/scale.R
scale_ui.Rd

A more traditional UI is available through internal functions if this would make more sense to you.

fill_c(type = "warm", ...)

colour_c(type = "warm", ...)

color_c(type = "warm", ...)

fill_b(type = "warm", ...)

colour_b(type = "warm", ...)

color_b(type = "warm", ...)

fill_d(type = "qual", ...)

colour_d(type = "div", ...)

color_d(type = "div", ...)

Arguments

type

Describe type.
...

Describe dots.
